insert.isNotEmpty:
INSERT INTO $boardId$ ( ID , GRP , IDX , IS_SECRET , IS_NOTICE , IS_HTML , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , PASSWORD , EXT01 , EXT02 , EXT03 , EXT04 , EXT05 , EXT06 , EXT07 , EXT08 , EXT09 , EXT10 , EXT11 , EXT12 , EXT13 , EXT14 , EXT15 , EXT16 , EXT17 , EXT18 , EXT19 , EXT20 , DATE01 , DATE02 , HIT , WRITER , MBR_ID , MBR_IP , CREATED , MODIFIED , ACTIVE , ISDEL , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5 ) VALUES ( #id# , #grp# , #idx# , #isSecret# , #isNotice# , #isHtml# , #category# , #title# , #content# , #password# , #ext01# , #ext02# , #ext03# , #ext04# , #ext05# , #ext06# , #ext07# , #ext08# , #ext09# , #ext10# , #ext11# , #ext12# , #ext13# , #ext14# , #ext15# , #ext16# , #ext17# , #ext18# , #ext19# , #ext20# , #date01# , #date02# , #hit# , #writer# , #mbrId# , #mbrIp#
, SYSDATE
, #created#
, SYSDATE
, #modified#
, 1 , #isdel# , #tmp1# , #tmp2# , #tmp3# , #tmp4# , #tmp5# )

update.isNotEmpty:
UPDATE $boardId$
SET IS_SECRET=#isSecret# , IS_NOTICE=#isNotice# , IS_HTML=#isHtml# , CATEGORY=#category# , TITLE=#title# , CONTENT=#content# , EXT01=#ext01# , EXT02=#ext02# , EXT03=#ext03# , EXT04=#ext04# , EXT05=#ext05# , EXT06=#ext06# , EXT07=#ext07# , EXT08=#ext08# , EXT09=#ext09# , EXT10=#ext10# , EXT11=#ext11# , EXT12=#ext12# , EXT13=#ext13# , EXT14=#ext14# , EXT15=#ext15# , EXT16=#ext16# , EXT17=#ext17# , EXT18=#ext18# , EXT19=#ext19# , EXT20=#ext20# , DATE01=#date01# , DATE02=#date02# , HIT=#hit# , WRITER=#writer#
, CREATED=#created#
, MODIFIED=SYSDATE , ISDEL=#isdel# , TMP1=#tmp1# , TMP2=#tmp2# , TMP3=#tmp3# , TMP4=#tmp4# , TMP5=#tmp5# WHERE ID=#id#
SET IS_SECRET=#isSecret# , IS_NOTICE=#isNotice# , IS_HTML=#isHtml# , CATEGORY=#category# , TITLE=#title# , CONTENT=#content# , EXT01=#ext01# , EXT02=#ext02# , EXT03=#ext03# , EXT04=#ext04# , EXT05=#ext05# , EXT06=#ext06# , EXT07=#ext07# , EXT08=#ext08# , EXT09=#ext09# , EXT10=#ext10# , EXT11=#ext11# , EXT12=#ext12# , EXT13=#ext13# , EXT14=#ext14# , EXT15=#ext15# , EXT16=#ext16# , EXT17=#ext17# , EXT18=#ext18# , EXT19=#ext19# , EXT20=#ext20# , DATE01=#date01# , DATE02=#date02# , HIT=#hit#
, CREATED=#created#
, MODIFIED=SYSDATE , ISDEL=#isdel# , TMP3=#tmp3# , TMP4=#tmp4# , TMP5=#tmp5# WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1# AND TMP2 = #tmp2#

UPDATE $boardId$
SET HIT=HIT+1 WHERE ID=#id#
SET HIT=HIT+1 WHERE TMP1=#tmp1# AND TMP2=#id#

isNotEmpty.isEqual:
DELETE FROM $boardId$
WHERE ID=#id#
WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1#
WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1# AND TMP2=#tmp2#
WHERE GRP=#grp#
WHERE IDX LIKE #idx#||'_%'

UPDATE $boardId$ SET ISDEL = 1
WHERE ID=#id#
WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1# AND TMP2 = #tmp2#

update.isNotEmpty:
UPDATE $boardId$ SET ISDEL = '0'
WHERE ID=#id#
WHERE TMP1 = #tmp1# AND TMP2 = #tmp2#

select.isNotEmpty:
SELECT *FROM( SELECT '$boardId$' AS BOARD_ID , ID , GRP , IDX , IS_SECRET , IS_NOTICE , IS_HTML , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , PASSWORD , EXT01 , EXT02 , EXT03 , EXT04 , EXT05 , EXT06 , EXT07 , EXT08 , EXT09 , EXT10 , EXT11 , EXT12 , EXT13 , EXT14 , EXT15 , EXT16 , EXT17 , EXT18 , EXT19 , EXT20 , DATE01 , DATE02 , HIT , CASE WHEN WRITER = '' THEN '익명' ELSE WRITER END AS WRITER , MBR_ID , MBR_IP , CREATED , MODIFIED , ACTIVE , ISDEL , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5 FROM $boardId$ WHERE 1=1
ID=#id#
ORDER BY CREATED DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT '$boardId$' AS BOARD_ID , ID , GRP , IDX , IS_SECRET , IS_NOTICE , IS_HTML , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , PASSWORD , EXT01 , EXT02 , EXT03 , EXT04 , EXT05 , EXT06 , EXT07 , EXT08 , EXT09 , EXT10 , EXT11 , EXT12 , EXT13 , EXT14 , EXT15 , EXT16 , EXT17 , EXT18 , EXT19 , EXT20 , DATE01 , DATE02 , HIT
, (CASE WHEN a.WRITER IS NULL THEN b.MBR_NM WHEN a.WRITER='' THEN b.MBR_NM ELSE a.WRITER END) AS WRITER
, (CASE WHEN a.WRITER IS NULL THEN '익명' ELSE a.WRITER END) AS WRITER
, a.MBR_ID , a.MBR_IP , a.CREATED , a.MODIFIED , a.ACTIVE , a.ISDEL , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5
FROM $boardId$ a, JNITCMSMBR b WHERE ID=#id# AND b.MBR_ID=a.MBR_ID
FROM $boardId$ a WHERE ID=#id#

SELECT * FROM(
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '$boardId$' AS BOARD_ID , a.ID , a.GRP , a.IDX , a.IS_SECRET , a.IS_NOTICE , a.IS_HTML , a.CATEGORY , a.TITLE
( TO_CLOB(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(a.CONTENT,1000,1)) )AS CONTENT
, a.PASSWORD , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT01)) AS EXT01 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT02)) AS EXT02 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT03)) AS EXT03 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT04)) AS EXT04 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT05)) AS EXT05 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT06)) AS EXT06 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT07)) AS EXT07 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT08)) AS EXT08 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT09)) AS EXT09 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT10)) AS EXT10 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT11)) AS EXT11 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT12)) AS EXT12 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT13)) AS EXT13 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT14)) AS EXT14 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT15)) AS EXT15 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT16)) AS EXT16 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT17)) AS EXT17 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT18)) AS EXT18 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT19)) AS EXT19 , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(a.EXT20)) AS EXT20 , TO_CHAR(a.DATE01,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AS DATE01 , TO_CHAR(a.DATE02,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AS DATE02 , a.HIT , (CASE WHEN a.WRITER IS NULL THEN b.MBR_NM WHEN a.WRITER='' THEN b.MBR_NM ELSE a.WRITER END) AS WRITER , a.MBR_ID , a.MBR_IP , TO_CHAR(a.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AS CREATED , TO_CHAR(a.MODIFIED,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AS MODIFIED , a.ACTIVE , a.ISDEL , a.TMP1 , a.TMP2 , a.TMP3 , a.TMP4 , a.TMP5
, NVL(c.FILE_ID,'') AS FILE_ID , NVL(c.FILE_URL,'') AS FILE_URL , NVL(c.FILE_PATH,'') AS FILE_PATH , NVL(c.FILE_NM,'') AS FILE_NM , NVL(c.FILE_ONM,'') AS FILE_ONM , NVL(c.ISMAIN,'') AS ISMAIN , NVL(c.EXT01,'') AS FILE_EXT01 , NVL(c.EXT01,'') AS FILE_EXT02
, NVL(d.MBR_ID,'') AS M_MBR_ID , NVL(d.MBR_NM,'') AS M_MBR_NM , NVL(d.TEL,'') AS M_TEL , NVL(d.MOBILE,'') AS M_MOBILE , NVL(d.EMAIL,'') AS M_EMAIL
, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM $boardId$
ORDER BY
HIT DESC,
DATE01 ASC,
GRP DESC, IDX nulls first
DATE01 ASC
TMP3 DESC, CREATED DESC
) a
LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITCMSMBR b ON b.MBR_ID=a.MBR_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN jnitboardfile c
ON a.ID = c.BOARD_CNT_ID AND c.BOARD_ID = '$boardId$'
ON a.TMP2 = c.BOARD_CNT_ID AND c.BOARD_ID = a.TMP1
AND c.ISMAIN = 1 AND c.ISDEL = 0
LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITCMSMBR d ON d.MBR_ID=TO_CHAR(a.EXT05)
LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITBOARDINFO e on e.BOARD_ID=a.TMP1
WHERE 1=1
BOARD_GROUP = #searchSite#
( TO_CHAR(a.DATE01,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(#searchDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD') OR (TO_CHAR(a.DATE01,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(#searchDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(a.DATE02,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(#searchDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD')) )
( TO_CHAR(a.DATE01,'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(#searchMonth#,'YYYY-MM') OR (TO_CHAR(a.DATE01,'YYYY-MM') <= TO_CHAR(#searchMonth#,'YYYY-MM') AND TO_CHAR(a.DATE02,'YYYY-MM') >= TO_CHAR(#searchMonth#,'YYYY-MM')) )
a.ISDEL != 1 AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(a.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'),'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') <= SYSDATE
(a.IDX IS NULL OR IDX = '')
(a.GRP = #grp# AND a.IDX IS NOT NULL)
a.CATEGORY = #searchCategory#
a.CATEGORY = #selectList[]#
$Query$
(a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
a.WRITER LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.IS_NOTICE = 1
a.IS_NOTICE = 0
a.MBR_ID = #myBoardList#
a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT01 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT02 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT03 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT04 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT05 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT06 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT07 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT08 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT09 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT10 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT11 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT12 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT13 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT14 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT15 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT16 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT17 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT18 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT19 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT20 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
TO_CHAR(a.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#createdStartDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(#createdEndDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
( IDX=#idx# OR IDX LIKE #idx#||'_%' )
(ID=#id# OR GRP=#id# )
ROWNUM <= #lastIndex#
ORDER BY
a.HIT DESC,
a.DATE01 ASC,
a.GRP DESC, a.IDX nulls first
a.DATE01 ASC
TMP3 DESC, CREATED DESC
) WHERE 1=1
RNUM > #firstIndex#
) ORDER BY
HIT DESC,
CREATED DESC, TMP3 DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM $boardId$ a LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITCMSMBR b on b.MBR_ID=a.MBR_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN jnitboardfile c
ON a.ID = c.BOARD_CNT_ID AND c.BOARD_ID = '$boardId$'
ON a.TMP2 = c.BOARD_CNT_ID AND c.BOARD_ID = a.TMP1
AND c.ISMAIN = 1 AND c.ISDEL = 0
LEFT OUTER JOIN JNITBOARDINFO e on e.BOARD_ID=a.TMP1
WHERE 1=1
BOARD_GROUP = #searchSite#
( TO_CHAR(DATE01,'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(#searchDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD') OR (TO_CHAR(DATE01,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(#searchDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(DATE02,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(#searchDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD')) )
( TO_CHAR(DATE01,'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(#searchMonth#,'YYYY-MM') OR (TO_CHAR(DATE01,'YYYY-MM') <= TO_CHAR(#searchMonth#,'YYYY-MM') AND TO_CHAR(DATE02,'YYYY-MM') >= TO_CHAR(#searchMonth#,'YYYY-MM')) )
a.ISDEL != 1 AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(a.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'),'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') <= SYSDATE
(IDX IS NULL OR IDX = '')
(a.GRP = #grp# AND IDX IS NOT NULL)
a.CATEGORY = #searchCategory#
a.CATEGORY = #selectList[]#
$Query$
(a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
a.WRITER LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.IS_NOTICE = 1
a.IS_NOTICE = 0
a.MBR_ID = #myBoardList#
a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.CONTENT LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT01 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT02 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT03 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT04 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT05 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT06 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT07 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT08 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT09 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT10 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT11 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT12 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT13 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT14 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT15 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT16 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT17 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT18 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT19 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.EXT20 LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
TO_CHAR(a.CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#createdStartDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AND TO_CHAR(#createdEndDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS')
( IDX=#idx# OR IDX LIKE #idx#||'_%' )
(ID=#id# OR GRP=#id# )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '$boardId$' AS BOARD_ID , ID , GRP , IDX , IS_SECRET , IS_NOTICE , IS_HTML , CATEGORY , TITLE , CONTENT , PASSWORD , EXT01 , EXT02 , EXT03 , EXT04 , EXT05 , EXT06 , EXT07 , EXT08 , EXT09 , EXT10 , EXT11 , EXT12 , EXT13 , EXT14 , EXT15 , EXT16 , EXT17 , EXT18 , EXT19 , EXT20 , DATE01 , DATE02 , HIT , CASE WHEN WRITER = '' THEN '익명' ELSE WRITER END AS WRITER , MBR_ID , MBR_IP , CREATED , MODIFIED , ACTIVE , ISDEL , TMP1 , TMP2 , TMP3 , TMP4 , TMP5 FROM $boardId$ WHERE 1=1 AND IS_NOTICE = 0 AND ROWNUM = 1
ISDEL != 1 AND IS_SECRET = 0 AND TO_CHAR(CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
GRP > #searchKeyword# AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC
GRP < #searchKeyword# AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY id DESC
GRP = #searchKeyword# ORDER BY GRP DESC, IDX
CREATED > (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY CREATED ASC
CREATED < (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY CREATED DESC
CREATED = (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL
CREATED < (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY CREATED DESC
CREATED > (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL ORDER BY CREATED ASC
CREATED = (select created from $boardId$ where grp=#searchKeyword# ) AND IDX IS NULL
) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(A.IDX,1,LENGTH(A.IDX)-1), CHR(ASCII(SUBSTR(A.IDX,-1))+1)) AS IDX FROM (SELECT GRP, IDX, SUBSTR(IDX, 0,LENGTH(#idx#)) AS GID FROM $boardId$ WHERE GRP = #grp# AND NVL(LENGTH(IDX),0) = NVL(LENGTH(#idx#),0) + 1 ORDER BY IDX DESC nulls last) A WHERE A.GID = #idx# OR A.GID IS NULL ORDER BY IDX DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM = 1
